name: Ceramic Mugs Chun - set of 4
description:
Set of 4 stoneware mugs.
Thumb rest on the handles for a comfortable hold. 
Glossy chun glaze that renders a blue, white and bown speckled look. 
Wheel thrown and fired in an electric kiln. 
Measures approximately 7.1 cm tall x 10.7 cm wide, including handle. 
Capacity of approximately 150 ml. 
Microwave and dishwasher safe.

All these pieces are hand made and variations occur in each one. However you may request one in a similar size and style. Do note that your piece may vary in appearance, however it will be one of a kind. Contact me for a custom-made piece!

name: REDUCED - Ceramic Chun Tea Set - Set for 2
description:
ON SALE - REDUCED from €30 to €20

Unfortunately this tea pot has suffered a slight bang & one of the handle loops have broken. It has been re-attached with the utmost care & is now being sold at a reduced price. Although not in mint condition, it's still a lovely piece! 

Click on photo 5 to see a close up of the break.

The set is glazed in a transpaprent chun and includes a tea pot with a hand woven cane handle. This tea set is designed for two people and comes with two cups, although you may request additional cups. 

The pot measures approximately 6.2 cm tall to the knob & 12 cm to the top of the handle. 
The body, including the spout measures about 15.5 cm with a capacity of about 120 ml. 
Tea cups measure 6.8 cm tall and 6.5 cm wide with a capacity of approximately 50 ml. 

The tea pot and cups were all wheel thrown and fired in an electric kiln. 
Tea pot is hand wash only. Tea cups are microwave and dishwasher safe. 

All these pieces are hand made and variations occur in each one. However you may request your very own tea set, in whatever capacity, colour and style you wish. Do note that your piece may vary in appearance to the one pictured here, however it will be one of a kind. Contact me for a custom-made tea set!

name: Ceramic Fruit Bowl Natural/Black Shell Decoration - Stoneware
description:
Shell decorated fruit or serving bowl. 
On the outside a natural transparent glaze and inside glossy black. You will find along the rim of the bowl, the glaze drip where the two glazes have combined. Shell impressions decorate the outside. 
Wheel thrown and fired in an electric kiln. 
Measures approximately 12 cm tall x 21 cm wide. 
Capacity of approximately 1500 ml. 
Microwave and dishwasher safe.

This bowl is hand made and unique however you may request one in a similar size and style. Do note that your piece may vary in appearance, however it will be one of a kind. Contact me for a custom-made piece!

name: Bowl Set Ceramic - Set of 3 - Terra Bianca Glaze
description:
Set of 3 small stoneware ceramic bowls. 
Natural toned glaze in terra bianca with various shell impressions around the side. 
Wheel thrown and fired in an electric kiln. 
Measures approximately 7.8 cm tall x 12 cm wide. 
Capacity of approximately 250 ml. 
Microwave and dishwasher safe.

All these pieces are hand made and variations occur in each one. You may also request a set in a similar size and style. Do note that your piece may vary in appearance, however it will be one of a kind. Contact me for a custom-made piece!

name: Ceramic Bowls Set for 2 - Volcanic Ash Glaze
description:
Set of 2 stoneware ceramic bowls. 
Glazed with chun and volcanic ash from Mount Etna
Wheel thrown and fired in an electric kiln. 
Measures approximately 8 cm tall x 18.8 cm wide. 
Capacity of approximately 300 ml. 
Microwave and dishwasher safe.

All these pieces are hand made and variations occur in each one. You may also request a set in a similar size and style. Do note that your piece may vary in appearance, however it will be one of a kind. Contact me for a custom-made piece!
